tools.name: getM365RoadmapInfo
tools.description: Retrieve Microsoft 365 Roadmap items from https://www.microsoft.com/releasecommunications/api/v2/m365 using OData query parameters.

filter.description: OData filter expression. IMPORTANT: Use 'created' field for date filtering (not 'createdDateTime').

orderby.description: Order results by specified field. Use 'created' for date ordering (not 'createdDateTime').

top.description: Number of items to return (default: 10, max: 100) Set to 0 for count-only.

skip.description: Number of items to skip for pagination

count.description: Include total count of items in response
